org.apache.flink.client.program

类 ClusterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
  • 直接已知子类:
    StandaloneClusterClient

    public abstract class ClusterClient
extends Object
    Encapsulates the functionality necessary to submit a program to a remote cluster.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      • actorSystemLoader

        protected final ClusterClient.LazyActorSystemLoader actorSystemLoader
        The actor system used to communicate with the JobManager. Lazily initialized upon first use

      • flinkConfig

        protected final org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration flinkConfig
        Configuration of the client

      • timeout

        protected final scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout
        Timeout for futures

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ClusterClient

        public ClusterClient(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration flinkConfig)
              throws IOException
        Creates a instance that submits the programs to the JobManager defined in the configuration. This method will try to resolve the JobManager hostname and throw an exception if that is not possible.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The config used to obtain the job-manager's address, and used to configure the optimizer.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown, if the client's actor system could not be started.

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the client. This stops the internal actor system and actors.

      • setPrintStatusDuringExecution

        public void setPrintStatusDuringExecution(boolean print)
        Configures whether the client should print progress updates during the execution to System.out. All updates are logged via the SLF4J loggers regardless of this setting.
        参数:
        print - True to print updates to standard out during execution, false to not print them.

      • getPrintStatusDuringExecution

        public boolean getPrintStatusDuringExecution()
        返回:
        whether the client will print progress updates during the execution to System.out

      • getJobManagerAddress

        public InetSocketAddress getJobManagerAddress()
        Gets the current JobManager address (may change in case of a HA setup).
        返回:
        The address (host and port) of the leading JobManager

      • run

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult run(PackagedProgram prog,
                                                           int parallelism)
                                                    throws ProgramInvocationException
        General purpose method to run a user jar from the CliFrontend in either blocking or detached mode, depending on whether setDetached(true) or setDetached(false).
        参数:
        prog - the packaged program
        parallelism - the parallelism to execute the contained Flink job
        返回:
        The result of the execution
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult run(JobWithJars program,
                                                           int parallelism)
                                                    throws ProgramInvocationException
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult run(JobWithJars program,
                                                           int parallelism,
                                                           org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.SavepointRestoreSettings savepointSettings)
                                                    throws org.apache.flink.optimizer.CompilerException,
                                                           ProgramInvocationException
        Runs a program on the Flink cluster to which this client is connected. The call blocks until the execution is complete, and returns afterwards.
        参数:
        program - The program to be executed.
        parallelism - The default parallelism to use when running the program. The default parallelism is used when the program does not set a parallelism by itself.
        抛出:
        org.apache.flink.optimizer.CompilerException - Thrown, if the compiler encounters an illegal situation.
        ProgramInvocationException - Thrown, if the program could not be instantiated from its jar file, or if the submission failed. That might be either due to an I/O problem, i.e. the job-manager is unreachable, or due to the fact that the parallel execution failed.

      • run

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult run(org.apache.flink.optimizer.plan.FlinkPlan compiledPlan,
                                                           List<URL> libraries,
                                                           List<URL> classpaths,
                                                           ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                    throws ProgramInvocationException
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult run(org.apache.flink.optimizer.plan.FlinkPlan compiledPlan,

                                                           List<URL> classpaths,
                                                           ClassLoader classLoader,

      • run

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.JobExecutionResult run(org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.JobGraph jobGraph,
                                                          ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                   throws ProgramInvocationException
        Submits a JobGraph blocking.
        参数:
        jobGraph - The JobGraph
        classLoader - User code class loader to deserialize the results and errors (may contain custom classes).
        返回:
        JobExecutionResult
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

        参数:

      • cancel

        public void cancel(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId)
            throws Exception
        Cancels a job identified by the job id.
        参数:
        jobId - the job id
        抛出:
        Exception - In case an error occurred.

      • stop

        public void stop(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId)
          throws Exception
        Stops a program on Flink cluster whose job-manager is configured in this client's configuration. Stopping works only for streaming programs. Be aware, that the program might continue to run for a while after sending the stop command, because after sources stopped to emit data all operators need to finish processing.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID of the streaming program to stop
        抛出:
        Exception - If the job ID is invalid (ie, is unknown or refers to a batch job) or if sending the stop signal failed. That might be due to an I/O problem, ie, the job-manager is unreachable.

      • getAccumulators

        public Map<String,Object> getAccumulators(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobID)
                                   throws Exception
        Requests and returns the accumulators for the given job identifier. Accumulators can be requested while a is running or after it has finished. The default class loader is used to deserialize the incoming accumulator results.
        参数:
        jobID - The job identifier of a job.
        返回:
        A Map containing the accumulator's name and its value.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • getAccumulators

        public Map<String,Object> getAccumulators(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobID,
                                          ClassLoader loader)
                                   throws Exception
        Requests and returns the accumulators for the given job identifier. Accumulators can be requested while a is running or after it has finished.
        参数:
        jobID - The job identifier of a job.
        loader - The class loader for deserializing the accumulator results.
        返回:
        A Map containing the accumulator's name and its value.
        抛出:
        Exception

        Tells the JobManager to finish the session (job) defined by the given ID.
        参数:

        Logs and prints to sysout if printing to stdout is enabled.
        参数:
        message - The message to log/print

      • waitForClusterToBeReady

        public abstract void waitForClusterToBeReady()
        Blocks until the client has determined that the cluster is ready for Job submission. This is delayed until right before job submission to report any other errors first (e.g. invalid job definitions/errors in the user jar)

      • getWebInterfaceURL

        public abstract String getWebInterfaceURL()
        Returns an URL (as a string) to the JobManager web interface

      • getClusterStatus

        public abstract org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.messages.GetClusterStatusResponse getClusterStatus()
        Returns the latest cluster status, with number of Taskmanagers and slots

      • getNewMessages

        protected abstract List<String> getNewMessages()
        May return new messages from the cluster. Messages can be for example about failed containers or container launch requests.

      • getClusterIdentifier

        public abstract String getClusterIdentifier()
        Returns a string representation of the cluster.

      • finalizeCluster

        protected abstract void finalizeCluster()
        Request the cluster to shut down or disconnect.

      • setDetached

        public void setDetached(boolean isDetached)
        Set the mode of this client (detached or blocking job execution).
        参数:
        isDetached - If true, the client will submit programs detached via the run method

      • isDetached

        public boolean isDetached()
        A flag to indicate whether this clients submits jobs detached.
        返回:
        True if the Client submits detached, false otherwise

      • getFlinkConfiguration

        public org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration getFlinkConfiguration()
        Return the Flink configuration object
        返回:
        The Flink configuration object

      • getMaxSlots

        public abstract int getMaxSlots()
        The client may define an upper limit on the number of slots to use
        返回:
        -1 if unknown

      • submitJob

        protected abstract org.apache.flink.api.common.JobSubmissionResult submitJob(org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.JobGraph jobGraph,
                                                                             ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                                      throws ProgramInvocationException
        Calls the subclasses' submitJob method. It may decide to simply call one of the run methods or it may perform some custom job submission logic.
        参数:
        jobGraph - The JobGraph to be submitted
        返回:
        JobSubmissionResult
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException
